content: this pattern is by no means original many different parts were pulled from other hats i wanted to create a sleep hat that had no seams and no knots to irritate the skin while lying down i needed a hat that fit snug and kept the head warm all night i found a few knit patterns that filled all the requirements i did not find a crochet pattern that met all these needs so i wrote this basic outline this pattern was created on ravelry just so that i could duplicate it easily in my projects if you happen to stumble across this and want to give it a try feel free holler here at rav if you have any problems or corrections **pattern found here ** http //crochetedfleece blogspot com/2012/06/crochet-chemo-sleep-cap html 1 1 http //crochetedfleece blogspot com/2012/06/crochet-chemo-sleep-cap html
